title: Case-Based Learning Course Using Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and ward practicum experience
context.additional_context: Enhances critical thinking through case analysis replicating real medical scenarios in nursing simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more nursing problem-solving strategies by analyzing simulation-based clinical cases.
Learners can critically evaluate nursing interventions according to patient condition changes and provide optimal decision rationales.
Learners can perform structured thinking processes reflecting peer feedback during case discussions with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
